      • isServiceConnected

        public boolean isServiceConnected()
        Checks if the client is still connected to the service
        Returns:
        true if the client has connected to the indexing service, false otherwise

        Tells the search service to unload the files loaded by this IndexClient and disconnects from the SearchService
        Parameters:
        context -

      • buildIndex

        public void buildIndex(java.lang.String filePath,
              java.util.List<java.lang.String> contents)
        Tells the searchService to build a specific file

        To be used only in the case that the file is not already in the index In most cases the file will have already been indexed by the indexer.

        Parameters:
        filePath - Path of the file to be indexed
        contents - Contents of the file split by page in the form of an List

      • loadIndex

        public void loadIndex(java.lang.String filePath)
        Tells the SearchService to load the index at filePath
        Parameters:
        filePath - The path of the file to be loaded

      • unloadIndex

        public void unloadIndex(java.lang.String filePath)
        Tells the SearchService to unload the file
        Parameters:
        filePath - Path of the file to be unloaded

      • search

        public void search(java.lang.String text,
          java.lang.String filePath,
          boolean kill)
        Calls for a single file search
        Parameters:
        text - Text search query
        filePath - Path of the file to be searched
        kill - If true, cancels previous searches before searching

      • search

        public void search(java.lang.String text,
          java.lang.String filePath,
          int hits,
          boolean kill)
        Calls for a single file search
        Parameters:
        text - Text search query
        filePath - Path of the file to be searched
        hits - Maximum results to be generated
        kill - If true, cancels previous searches before searching

      • cancelSearch

        public void cancelSearch(int id)
        Cancels any searches that are in operation

      • search

        public void search(java.lang.String text,
          int type,
          java.lang.String filePath,
          int page,
          int hits,
          int set,
          boolean kill)
        Calls for a single file search
        Parameters:
        text - Text search query
        type - Type of search; one of QUERY_BOOLEAN or QUERY_STANDARD
        filePath - Path of the file to be searched
        page - Page on which to begin the search
        hits - Maximum results to be generated
        set - Set number, where searching for set n gives results from set*hits to set*hits + hits
        kill - If true, cancels previous searches before searching

      • searchIn

        public void searchIn(java.lang.String text,
            int type,
            java.util.List<java.lang.String> filePath,
            int hits,
            int set,
            boolean kill)
        Calls for a single file search
        Parameters:
        text - Text search query
        type - Type of search; one of QUERY_BOOLEAN or QUERY_STANDARD
        filePath - Path of the file to be searched
        hits - Maximum results to be generated
        set - Set number, where searching for set n gives results from set*hits to set*hits + hits
        kill - If true, cancels previous searches before searching

      • searchInPath

        public void searchInPath(java.lang.String text,
                int type,
                java.util.List<java.lang.String> filePath,
                int hits,
                int set,
                boolean kill)
        Calls for a multi-file search
        Parameters:
        text - Text search query
        type - Type of search; one of QUERY_BOOLEAN or QUERY_STANDARD
        filePath - Path of the file to be searched
        hits - Maximum results to be generated
        set - Set number, where searching for set n gives results from set*hits to set*hits + hits
        kill - If true, cancels previous searches before searching
